>From: Derek James <djames@...>
>I think John's image enlargement experiments are using relatively
>large images as well.

The end product will use large images.  But during the experiment, I use an 
expected output image size of 144x144, but the inputs are only 9x9 (plus 
top,left,right,bottom, and bias), and I only have a single output node, so 
it's not too bad.
